events.title: Louisiana Purchase Completed
events.description: The United States formally took possession of the Louisiana Territory, doubling the size of the country after purchasing it from France.
events.significance: This acquisition significantly expanded U.S. territory and was crucial for westward expansion.

events.title: South Carolina Secedes from the Union
events.description: South Carolina became the first state to secede from the United States, leading to the American Civil War.
events.significance: This event marked the beginning of the secession crisis and the eventual Civil War.

events.title: First Commercial Computer Installed
events.description: The LEO I (Lyons Electronic Office) computer was installed at the J. Lyons & Co. in London, becoming the first computer used for business applications.
events.significance: This milestone marked the start of commercial computing and the use of computers in business.

events.title: Romanian Revolution Begins
events.description: Protests that led to the overthrow of Nicolae Ceau»ôescu's communist regime in Romania began.
events.significance: This revolution was a key event in Eastern Europe's transition away from communism.
